summary: WHEN GETTING MY 3,000 MAINTENANCE. THE SERVICE MAN TOLD ME THAT THEY WOULD NOT PERFORM THE MAINTENANCE CHECK BECAUSE THE CAR NEEDED A NEW COMPUTER. THE COMPUTER CHIP NEEDED TO BE REPLACED, SO THE MAINTENANCE WOULD NOT BE NECESSARY. I'VE CALLED EVERY OTHER WEEK, TRYING TO FIND OUT WHAT AND WERE THE ARE ON GETTING THE COMPUTER. HERE IT IS ALMOST JUNE, AND NO REPLACEMENT. THE CHECK ENGINE LIGHT  CONTINUES TO GONE ON AND OFF EVERY OTHER DAY. I AM TIRED OF CALLING THE SERVICE DEPARTMENT. I AM A SINGLE MOTHER OF 3 BOYS WITH ONE INCOME. THAT IS WHY I PURCHASED A KIA, BECAUSE I THOUGHT IT WAS A RELIABLE CAR. CAN THIS PLEASE BE INVESTIGATED FARTHER THAN WHAT I CAN DO.   *NLM
